original_text: Surely as a wife treacherously departeth from her husband, so have ye dealt treacherously with me, O house of Israel, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 그런데 이스라엘 족속아 마치 아내가 그의 남편을 속이고 떠나감 같이 너희가 확실히 나를 속였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Surely as a wife treacherously departeth from her husband,
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 아내가 남편을 배신하고 떠나는 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so have ye dealt treacherously with me,
